property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 'ReleaseBlockOnCustomer' || '::' || "CustomerBlock"."ID" AS "ID",
       "CustomerBlock"."ID"                                 AS "CustomerBlock",
       "Customer"."ID"                                      AS "Customer",
       "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseTime"                        AS "Time",
       "CustomerBlock"."ReleasedBy_ID"                      AS "ExecutedBy",
       "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseExecutionType"               AS "ExecutionType",
       "CustomerBlock"."BlockType"                          AS "BlockType",
       "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseReason"                      AS "BlockReason"
FROM "o_custom_Customer" AS "Customer"
         LEFT JOIN "o_custom_CustomerBlock" AS "CustomerBlock"
                   ON "Customer"."ID" = "CustomerBlock"."Customer_ID"
WHERE "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseTime" IS NOT NULL

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
	'ReleaseBlockOnCustomer' || '::' || "CustomerBlock"."ID" AS "ID",
	"SalesOrder"."ID" AS "SalesOrder"
FROM "o_custom_CustomerBlock" AS "CustomerBlock"
	LEFT JOIN "o_custom_SalesOrder" AS "SalesOrder"
	    ON "CustomerBlock"."Customer_ID" = "SalesOrder"."Customer_ID"
WHERE "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseTime" IS NOT NULL
    AND "SalesOrder"."ID" IS NOT NULL
    AND "CustomerBlock"."ReleaseTime" > "SalesOrder"."CreationTime"
